Method Detail

countUnreadMessagesBetweenUsers

long countUnreadMessagesBetweenUsers(long fromId, long toId)
Count the number of unread messages between two users, mixing sended and received messages
Parameters:
fromId - Id of the user that send the message
toId - Id of the user that receives the message
Returns:
long

countUnreadedMessages

long countUnreadedMessages(long id, boolean onlyLast = false, java.util.List filterIds = [])
Count the number of messages that the user has received, and hasn't read
Parameters:
id - Id of the user
onlyLast - Count only the last message
filterIds - List of ids of users of with do not want to get the messages
Returns:
long

getLastMessages

java.util.List getLastMessages(long id, int offset = 0, int itemsByPage = -1, java.util.List filterIds = [])
Get a list of the conversations of the user, that is, 'last' messages. It is a list that mix sended and received messages, order by date
Parameters:
id - Id of the user
offset - Number of messages to skip (for pagination)
itemsByPage - Number of messages to return (for pagination). -1 will return all messages.
filterIds - List of ids of users of with do not wat to get the messages
Returns:
a list of Messages

getMessages

java.util.List getMessages(long id1, long id2, boolean onlyLast = false, int offset = 0, int itemsByPage = -1)
Get a list of the messages between two users. It is a list that mix sended and received messages, order by date Admit pagination
Parameters:
id1 - Id of one of the users
id2 - Id of the other of the users
onlyLast - Return only the last message
offset - For pagination, first
itemsByPage - For pagination, maximun number of messages to return. If it is -1, returns all messages.
Returns:
a list of Messages

getMessages

java.util.List getMessages(long messageId)
Get a list of the messages between the same users that a given message. It is a list that mix sended and received messages, order by date
Parameters:
messageId - Id of the message
Returns:
a list of Messages

getMessagesBetweenUsers

java.util.List getMessagesBetweenUsers(long fromId, long toId, int offset = 0, int itemsByPage = -1)
Get a list of the messages from an user to another, order by date Admit pagination
Parameters:
fromId - Id of the user that send the message
toId - Id of the user that receives the message
Returns:
a list of Messages

markAsRead

void markAsRead(java.util.List messages)
Mark a list of messages as read
Parameters:
messages - List of messages

sendMessage

Message sendMessage(long fromId, long toId, java.lang.String text)
Send a message from an user to another
Parameters:
fromId - Id of the user that send the message
toId - Id of the user that receives the message
text - The text of the message
Returns:
a Message
